name: HamsterStellar
description:
What home means to you ?

A heartbreaking and thriving quest through space and time to get back home. Or is it ?

Credits: 

Anthony Kozak - Unity chieftain

Mathieu Roth - Game Designer, art assets

Clément Dieu - 3D art

Matthias Thieys - présence réconfortante

Andy Duboc - R&D shader
